verses.verse: And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> gathered <WH622> <WH8799> all the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> to SH'khem <WH7927>, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> for the elders <WH2205> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and for their heads <WH7218>, and for their judges <WH8199> <WH8802>, and for their officers <WH7860> <WH8802>; and they presented <WH3320> <WH8691> themselves before <WH6440> 'Elohim <WH430>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto all the people <WH5971>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Your fathers <WH1> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8804> on the other side <WH5676> of the flood <WH5104> in old time <WH5769>, even Terah <WH8646>, the father <WH1> of Avraham <WH85>, and the father <WH1> of Nachor <WH5152>: and they served <WH5647> <WH8799> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>.

And I took <WH3947> <WH8799> your father <WH1> Avraham <WH85> from the other side <WH5676> of the flood <WH5104>, and led <WH3212> <WH8686> him throughout all the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, and multiplied <WH7235> <WH8686> his seed <WH2233>, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> him Yitz'chak <WH3327>.

And I gave <WH5414> <WH8799> unto Yitz'chak <WH3327> Ya`akov <WH3290> and Esav <WH6215>: and I gave <WH5414> <WH8799> unto Esav <WH6215> mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165>, to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it; but Ya`akov <WH3290> and his children <WH1121> went down <WH3381> <WH8804> into Egypt <WH4714>.

I sent <WH7971> <WH8799> Mosheh <WH4872> also and Aharon <WH175>, and I plagued <WH5062> <WH8799> Egypt <WH4714>, according to that which <WH834> I did <WH6213> <WH8804> among <WH7130> them: and afterward <WH310> I brought you out <WH3318> <WH8689>.

And I brought <WH3318> <WH8686> your fathers <WH1> out of Egypt <WH4714>: and ye came <WH935> <WH8799> unto the sea <WH3220>; and the Egyptians <WH4714> pursued <WH7291> <WH8799> after <WH310> your fathers <WH1> with chariots <WH7393> and horsemen <WH6571> unto the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>.

And when they cried <WH6817> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, he put <WH7760> <WH8799> darkness <WH3990> between you and the Egyptians <WH4713>, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> the sea <WH3220> upon them, and covered <WH3680> <WH8762> them; and your eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> <WH8799> what I have done <WH6213> <WH8804> in Egypt <WH4714>: and ye dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in the wilderness <WH4057> a long <WH7227> season <WH3117>.

And I brought <WH935> <WH8686> you into the land <WH776> of the Amorites <WH567>, which dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> on the other side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>; and they fought <WH3898> <WH8735> with you: and I gave <WH5414> <WH8799> them into your hand <WH3027>, that ye might possess <WH3423> <WH8799> their land <WH776>; and I destroyed <WH8045> <WH8686> them from before <WH6440> you.

Then Balak <WH1111> the son <WH1121> of Zippor <WH6834>, king <WH4428> of Moab <WH4124>, arose <WH6965> <WH8799> and warred <WH3898> <WH8735> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and sent <WH7971> <WH8799> and called <WH7121> <WH8799> Balaam <WH1109> the son <WH1121> of Beor <WH1160> to curse <WH7043> <WH8763> you:

But I would <WH14> <WH8804> not hearken <WH8085> <WH8800> unto Balaam <WH1109>; therefore he blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> you still <WH1288> <WH8800>: so I delivered <WH5337> <WH8686> you out of his hand <WH3027>.

And ye went over <WH5674> <WH8799> Yarden <WH3383>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> unto Yericho <WH3405>: and the men <WH1167> of Yericho <WH3405> fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against you, the Amorites <WH567>, and the Perizzites <WH6522>, and the Kanahanites <WH3669>, and the Hittites <WH2850>, and the Girgashites <WH1622>, the Hivites <WH2340>, and the Y'vusis <WH2983>; and I delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> them into your hand <WH3027>.

And I sent <WH7971> <WH8799> the shofaret <WH6880> before <WH6440> you, which drave them out <WH1644> <WH8762> from before <WH6440> you, even the two <WH8147> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>; but not with thy sword <WH2719>, nor with thy bow <WH7198>.

And I have given <WH5414> <WH8799> you a land <WH776> for which ye did not labour <WH3021> <WH8804>, and cities <WH5892> which ye built <WH1129> <WH8804> not, and ye dwell <WH3427> <WH8799> in them; of the vineyards <WH3754> and oliveyards <WH2132> which ye planted <WH5193> <WH8804> not do ye eat <WH398> <WH8802>.

Now therefore fear <WH3372> <WH8798> the YY <WH3068>, and serve <WH5647> <WH8798> him in sincerity <WH8549> and in truth <WH571>: and put away <WH5493> <WH8685> the 'elohim <WH430> which your fathers <WH1> served <WH5647> <WH8804> on the other side <WH5676> of the flood <WH5104>, and in Egypt <WH4714>; and serve <WH5647> <WH8798> ye the YY <WH3068>.

And if it seem evil <WH7489> <WH8804> unto you <WH4310> to serve <WH5647> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068>, choose <WH977> <WH8798> you this day <WH3117> whom <WH5869> ye will serve <WH5647> <WH8799>; whether the 'elohim <WH430> which your fathers <WH1> served <WH5647> <WH8804> that were on the other side <WH5676> of the flood <WH5104>, or the 'elohim <WH430> of the Amorites <WH567>, in whose land <WH776> ye dwell <WH3427> <WH8802>: but as for me and my house <WH1004>, we will serve <WH5647> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>.

And the people <WH5971> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>, 'Elohim forbid <WH2486> that we should forsake <WH5800> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068>, to serve <WH5647> <WH8800> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>;

For the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, he it is that brought us up <WH5927> <WH8688> and our fathers <WH1> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, from the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>, and which did <WH6213> <WH8804> those great <WH1419> signs <WH226> in our sight <WH5869>, and preserved <WH8104> <WH8799> us in all the way <WH1870> wherein we went <WH1980> <WH8804>, and among all the people <WH5971> through <WH7130> whom we passed <WH5674> <WH8804>:

And the YY <WH3068> drave out <WH1644> <WH8762> from before <WH6440> us all the people <WH5971>, even the Amorites <WH567> which dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in the land <WH776>: therefore will we also serve <WH5647> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>; for he is our 'Elohim <WH430>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the people <WH5971>, Ye cannot <WH3201> <WH8799> serve <WH5647> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068>: for he is an holy <WH6918> 'Elohim <WH430>; he is a jealous <WH7072> 'Elohim <WH410>; he will not forgive <WH5375> <WH8799> your transgressions <WH6588> nor your sins <WH2403>.

If ye forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>, and serve <WH5647> <WH8804> strange <WH5236> 'elohim <WH430>, then he will turn <WH7725> <WH8804> and do you hurt <WH7489> <WH8689>, and consume <WH3615> <WH8765> you, after <WH310> that he hath done you good <WH3190> <WH8689>.
And the people <WH5971> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, Nay; but we will serve <WH5647> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the people <WH5971>, Ye are witnesses <WH5707> against yourselves that ye have chosen <WH977> <WH8804> you the YY <WH3068>, to serve <WH5647> <WH8800> him. And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, We are witnesses <WH5707>.

Now therefore put away <WH5493> <WH8685>, said he, the strange <WH5236> 'elohim <WH430> which are among <WH7130> you, and incline <WH5186> <WH8685> your heart <WH3824> unto the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And the people <WH5971> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, The YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> will we serve <WH5647> <WH8799>, and his voice <WH6963> will we obey <WH8085> <WH8799>.

So Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> made <WH3772> <WH8799> a covenant <WH1285> with the people <WH5971> that day <WH3117>, and set <WH7760> <WH8799> them a statute <WH2706> and an ordinance <WH4941> in SH'khem <WH7927>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> wrote <WH3789> <WH8799> these words <WH1697> in the book <WH5612> of the Torah <WH8451> of 'Elohim <WH430>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> a great <WH1419> stone <WH68>, and set it up <WH6965> <WH8686> there under an oak <WH427>, that was by the sanctuary <WH4720> of the YY <WH3068>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto all the people <WH5971>, Behold, this stone <WH68> shall be a witness <WH5713> unto us; for it hath heard <WH8085> <WH8804> all the words <WH561> of the YY <WH3068> which he spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto us: it shall be therefore a witness <WH5713> unto you, lest ye deny <WH3584> <WH8762> your 'Elohim <WH430>.
So Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> let the people <WH5971> depart <WH7971> <WH8762>, every man <WH376> unto his inheritance <WH5159>.

And it came to pass after <WH310> these things <WH1697>, that Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, the servant <WH5650> of the YY <WH3068>, died <WH4191> <WH8799>, being an hundred <WH3967> and ten <WH6235> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>.

And they buried <WH6912> <WH8799> him in the border <WH1366> of his inheritance <WH5159> in Timnathserah <WH8556>, which is in mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669>, on the north side <WH6828> of the hill <WH2022> of Gaash <WH1608>.

And Yisra'EL <WH3478> served <WH5647> <WH8799> the YY <WH3068> all the days <WH3117> of Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, and all the days <WH3117> of the elders <WH2205> that overlived <WH748> <WH8689> <WH3117> <WH310> Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, and which had known <WH3045> <WH8804> all the works <WH4639> of the YY <WH3068>, that he had done <WH6213> <WH8804> for Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And the bones <WH6106> of Yosef <WH3130>, which the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> brought up <WH5927> <WH8689> out of Egypt <WH4714>, buried <WH6912> <WH8804> they in SH'khem <WH7927>, in a parcel <WH2513> of ground <WH7704> which Ya`akov <WH3290> bought <WH7069> <WH8804> of the sons <WH1121> of Hamor <WH2544> the father <WH1> of SH'khem <WH7927> for an hundred <WH3967> pieces of silver <WH7192>: and it became the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Yosef <WH3130>.

And Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175> died <WH4191> <WH8804>; and they buried <WH6912> <WH8799> him in a hill <WH1389> that pertained to Pinchas <WH6372> his son <WH1121>, which was given <WH5414> <WH8738> him in mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669>.
